definition: soldier/servant/to finish/to die/finally/at last/pawn in Chinese chess
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: To summarize the effects of rehabilitation nursing for 112 stroke patients with dysphagia.
sentences.chinese: 总结了112例脑卒中患者吞咽障碍的康复护理体会。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the relationship between post-stroke depression and social sustain and coping style with an aim to guide the prospective psychological intervention.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑卒中后抑郁与社会支持及应对方式的关系。

sentences.english: Objective: To probe into the effect of emotion nursing to improve post-stroke depression for cerebral apoplexy patients.
sentences.chinese: 探讨情志护理对改善脑卒中后病人的抑郁状态效果。

sentences.english: ConclusionsImproving communication methods can decrease the depressive level of the patients with stroke dysphasia.
sentences.chinese: 结论改善沟通可以降低脑卒中语言障碍患者抑郁程度。

sentences.english: To observe the effects of needling combined with function training on the balance function of stroke patients.
sentences.chinese: 探讨针刺配合功能训练对脑卒中患者平衡功能的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To appraise the clinic effect of mini-invasive drainage on hemorrhages cerebral apoplexy with herniation.
sentences.chinese: 探讨微创穿刺引流对出血性脑卒中并脑疝的治疗价值。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the influence of Zhenweifang on the muscle tension in flaccid paralysis period and prognosis of stroke.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察振痿方对脑卒中软瘫期肌张力及预后的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To explore self-care agency and its relating factors among patients with stroke.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究脑卒中病人自我护理能力及其影响因素。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the clinical features and the onset mechanism of epilepsy after stroke.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑卒中后癫癎的临床特点及发病机制。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the function of Shoulder Belt Protector in preventing the dislocation of shoulder for brain apoplexy patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨护肩带对脑卒中患者肩关节脱位的预防作用。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical curative effects of Puerarin combination with Shuxuening injection in the treatment of acute ischemic stroke.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察舒血宁联合葛根素急性缺血性脑卒中的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective: To observe the recovery effect of early intervention on dyskinesia after acute cerebral apoplexy.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察急性脑卒中后肢体运动障碍的早期康复效果。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of swallowing training on swallowing disorders following stroke.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨改善吞咽动作训练治疗脑卒中吞咽障碍疗效。

sentences.english: Objective Analysis of psychological intervention on the clinical effects of post-stroke depression.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结分析心理干预对脑卒中后抑郁的临床效果。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo observe the effect of multidisciplinary rehabilitation on prognosis of patients with stroke hemiplegia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察综合康复治疗对脑卒中偏瘫患者预后的影响。

sentences.english: Post-stroke depression is one of the common complications of Cerebrovascular Disease.
sentences.chinese: 脑卒中后抑郁症是脑血管病的常见并发症之一。

definition: atrial fibrillation (abbr. for 心房顫動|心房颤动[xin1 fang2 chan4 dong4])
abbr. for 心肌梗塞[xin1 ji1 geng3 sai1], myocardial infarction/heart attack
